articles.author: Jen Christensen
articles.title: Doctors ignore new federal vaccine recommendations to stick with science - CNN
articles.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics on Monday released its updated recommendations for what vaccines children should get. It’s a routine revision, hardly different from last year’s recommendations, but it carries more significance this year: More states and do…
